LanguageData.CS_SetVialCountTooltip: Click to change the number of {METAL} vials {PAWN} will keep in {pawn_possessive} inventory.
LanguageData.CS_SetVialLevelTooltip: Drag the bar to configure when {PAWN} will consume a {METAL} vial.
LanguageData.CS_ChangeVialStock: Click to vial to change the number of {METAL} vials {PAWN} will keep in {pawn_possessive} inventory.
